mapper.select: SELECT /* IntimateMessageMapper.searchIntimateMessageAppCodiList, Intimate Message 앱코디 상품 리스트 조회, 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-27 */ JA.* FROM (SELECT IA.* , COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY IA.RANK, IA.UPD_DT DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C.PROD_ID ORDER BY D.REG_DT DESC) AS RNUM , A.RANK , B.TOP_MENU_ID , B.DRM_YN , C.PROD_ID , C.PART_PROD_ID , D.REG_DT , D.UPD_DT FROM TB_DP_MSG_PROD A , TB_DP_PROD B , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE E , TB_CM_DEVICE F WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND C.PART_PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.MANIA_CD = #{daCode} AND A.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND (E.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR E.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND (CASE WHEN B.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN (CASE WHEN (NVL(B.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(F.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN, 'N') = 'N') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ELSE 1 END) = 1 AND DECODE(B.TOP_MENU_ID , 'DP13' , DECODE(F.EBOOK_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) , 'DP14' , DECODE(F.COMIC_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) , 'DP15' , 0 , 'DP16' , DECODE(B.META_CLSF_CD, 'CT25', DECODE(F.MUSIC_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0), 1) , 1) = 1 ) IA WHERE RNUM = 1 ) JA WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count}
